name: Super Mario 64 - Reimagined by NimsoNy
description:
-FAN MADE DEMO-
Super Mario 64 Reimagined!



Welcome to Super Mario 64 Reimagined

This is a FAN MADE production; an experiment and study in to achieving the highest quality standard I could possibly achieve as a one person team.



This is not a full game and only contains a reimagining of the start of the original game. This includes everything from the Title screen right up to the first floor inside the castle.


Except for the character models, everything including the level structure, textures and even the animations were made solely by me.
With a few painting images from other sources, credits included in the game for everyone whose work was used.



Why I made this?

I am an indie Game Developer that specialises in 3D Platforming as well as new ideas in the VR world.

Super Mario and other classic games by Nintendo are what got me in to Game Development and I have always wished I was able to replicate the quality standards, the passion and care that Nintendo puts in to the series.

This project was my attempt to prove to myself that I could do it, I am truly proud of this build and I hope others can see the merit in my work.

Thank you so much for playing my game!


- DISCLAIMER -

This is a FAN MADE reimagining of the Castle area of Super Mario 64.
The Models and Textures for the castle, as well as all Animations, were created from scratch by me.

This work is NOT ASSOCIATED in any way with Nintendo, all copyrights for the characters depicted, level designs and original music composition belong to Nintendo.

This work is provided as is and completely free.
No donations are accepted on this product itself.


If you like this project be sure to check out my stuff on YouTube! https://www.youtube.com/user/nimsony
